```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Setting up our randomly generated data.
```{r}
set.seed(1)

x <- matrix(rnorm(20*2), ncol=2)
y <- c(rep(-1, 10), rep(1, 10))

x[y==1,] <- x[y==1,] + 1
plot(x, col=(3-y))
```

```{r}
df <- data.frame(x=x, y=as.factor(y))

svm_fit

```
